about_the_game:
[Overview]

"CUPLEX" is a time-shift action puzzle game where you cooperate with "your past self" to reach the goal. With each turn, your "past self" multiplies.
You will utilize them effectively to solve complex and orderly puzzles.

[Story]

The new virtual space, "CUPLEX". This is a virtual space unlike traditional ones, where all senses, including sight, hearing, smell, taste, and touch, are interconnected.The protagonist "Cube" hacked into the "Library" within CUPLEX in search of specific information. As he progresses through the Library, the truth behind CUPLEX gradually unfolds. Will he be able to accomplish his mission in the end...?

[Features]

・A unique puzzle system utilizing "time-shift action"
・A relaxed atmosphere with calming music and graphics
・Numerous gimmicks and a total of 36 stages.
・More than 10 hidden Items
・A ranking system in order to compete with players around the world

name: CUPLEX Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: ----At the end of pursuit, your body becomes the history. "CUPLEX" is a time-shift action puzzle game where you cooperate with "your past self" to reach the goal. Utilize various gimmicks to conquer stages and unveil the truth behind CUPLEX.
